channel.title: Music – Chic

item.title: Chic - Le Freak
item.description:
작사: Nile Rodgers, Bernard Edwards
KY: 60611 / KY: 7012

Freak out le freak
so chic Freak out
Freak out le freak
so chic Freak out
Have you heard
about the new dance
craze Listen
to us
I’m sure
you’ll be amazed
Big fun to be
had by everyone
It’s up to you
surely can be done
Young and old are
doin’ it
I’m told
Just one try
and you too
will be sold
It’s called
le freak
they’re doin’ it
night and day
Allow us we’ll
show you the way
Freak out le freak
so chic Freak out
All that pressure
got you down
Has your head
spinnin’ all around
Feel the rhythm
chant the rhyme
Come on along and
have a real good time
Like the days of old
stompin’ at the Savoy
Now we freak
oh what a joy
Just come on
down to the 54
Find your spot out
on the floor
Freak out le freak
so chic Freak out
Le
freak

I said
freak

Le
freak

All that pressure
got you down
Has your head
spinnin’ all around
Feel the rhythm
chant the rhyme
Come on along and
have a real good time
Like the days of old
stompin’ at the Savoy
Now we freak
oh what a joy
Just come on
down to the 54
Find your spot
out on the floor
Freak out le freak
so chic Freak out
